Encuentranos.Calle: Calle de la imaginación, local Otro Mundo

Contacto.Descripcion: Please use one of the following methods to answer your query.
Contacto.EmailTexto: Send us an e-mail and we will try to respond quickly.
Contacto.TelfTexto: Don´t hesitate to call Natalia, the contact person, if you need anything.

Instagram.Titulo: Fear not... Dare to discover a world from another dimension!
Instagram.Cuerpo: Follow us and share your experiences in the other dimension.

Twitter.Titulo: Portal to another dimension? Here's just one!
Twitter.Cuerpo: Follow us and keep up to date with all the news.

Facebook.Titulo: Exploring another dimension is better if you share it!
Facebook.Cuerpo: Follow us on Facebook, become a fan and join another world.

Mesa.EligeComensales: How many diners will there be?

Karaoke.Descripcion: Space to loosen up and sing your favorite song, without fear of making a fool of yourself.

Mesa.Descripcion: Place to embark on exciting board or card games, alone or with friends.

Gaming.Descripcion: Site where you can play without stopping a video game that excites you, as if you were in another dimension.

PlayStation.Descripcion: Dedicated room with Sony consoles, here you can play any Play game you prefer.

Switch.Descripcion: Perhaps the most familiar and for the little ones, a room to play entertaining and dynamic games.

Xbox.Descripcion: In this space you can find microsoft consoles and play any of these games, for lovers of professionalism and style.

Hamburguesa.Descripcion: Hamburger, chips and soft drink. A whole new dimension to discover.

Pizza.Descripcion: Medium pizza, 2 chips and 2 soft drinks to choose from. Perfect for duos.

EnsaladaCesar.Descripcion: Typical Caesar salad with an extra touch of Cheese!

EnsaladaDimension.Descripcion: House salad with: lettuce, cherry tomato, avocado, potato and pineapple

LOPD.1: In LA OTRA DIMENSION we guarantee the protection of our visitor's data.
LOPD.2: The CSI seal (Information Security Certificate) guarantees us as a secure website that complies with the ethical code of data protection on the internet.
LOPD.3: The website of LA OTRA DIMENSION, at www.laotradimension.es, does not automatically recognize any data regarding the identity of visitors to its page.
LOPD.4: In the services we offer, our objective is to generate a trustworthy website where our highest priority is to guarantee security and confidentiality in visits, through the request for registration and identification within it.
LOPD.5: In the cases that the user of the website needs, make claims, make reports about incidents, reservations or other questions, a form will be made available to the user where all these questions are collected.
LOPD.6: In any case, it will be necessary to collect those essential personal data to be able to inform and solve the report through this means.
LOPD.7: All these data are transferred with absolute confidentiality, not being accessible at any time by third parties for purposes other than those for which they have been requested.
